0bacee01-edab-4412-a262-baaf101152a0.name: namespace
0bacee01-edab-4412-a262-baaf101152a0.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_namespace_name')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'jvm_uptime_seconds')

4b06c096-8584-4d86-8f54-9bd38ddf9552.name: app_name
4b06c096-8584-4d86-8f54-9bd38ddf9552.queryValue:
SELECT distinct JSONExtractString(labels, 'app')
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE (metric_name = 'jvm_uptime_seconds')
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_namespace_name') in {{.namespace}})
and (JSONExtractString(labels, 'mp_app') = '')

widgets.description: Total number of instances running this application
widgets.title: Instances

filter.expression: k8s_namespace_name in ['.namespace'] AND app in ['.app_name'] AND mp_app = ''
